channel.title: Need help changing item reqs!
channel.description: I need help with changing my items requirements. It says i need 60 def to weild d claws how do i change it to only 60 att? please Help me!~

item.title: Need help changing item reqs!
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Go into Wearing:

Search:

} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Zamorak godsword”)) {
return 75;

then copy that, go to second to last item, hit enter after the

‘75;’

then change to:

} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Dragon Claws”)) {
return 60;

Then it’s 60 atk+ 60 def. If you want 60 atk, then close and re-open.

Search: (“Dragon Claws”))

And take it out, Unless it’s under Saradomin Sword, OR what-ever your last weapon was.

Read full topic
